lines.text:
[to Daisy]
This is the second inning, baby... We've got a whole game to play.
That's right Amos... But this is my ballpark, and I'm the manager... You play by my rules, or you're outta the game.
Johnny! We could've made it! But the games not over till it's over!

[Amos tells Hester that he is dying]
How much time do you have?
Time enough to hit one more outta the park.

[Amos has given himself a lethal shot]
I pick the time, Daisy.
